title: Sunderland set to sign Chelsea defender Jake Clarke-Salter on loan
description: Sunderland are on the brink of securing Jake Clarke-Salter on loan from Chelsea until the end of the season, according to Sky sources.
content: It is understood the two clubs have agreed a deal in principle, with the 20-year-old defender expected to travel to Wearside on Sunday to finalise the move.Clarke-Salter was included in the Chelsea squad for Saturday's FA Cup tie at Norwich.If the deal is completed, it will be Chris Coleman's first signing since he became Sunderland manager in November.Clarke-Salter, who is an England U20 international, has only made one Premier League appearance for the Blues and spent time on loan at Bristol Rovers last season.
